questionTitle: I had ________ decided to take a coat when it started to rain.
I'm sorry I ________ able to see you yesterday.
I can't advise you what to do: you must use your own ________.
I ________ to any of these meetings since last April.
________ to Professor Martin since last Monday?
There was ________ I could say.
Today's weather isn't as cold as it was yesterday, ________?
The policeman told the driver to pull over and asked, ________.
The other driver failed to signal his ________ to turn right so I had to brake suddenly.
Mary Smith decided to give up her job for the ________ of her children.
Stop criticising me all the time -you never stop getting ________ me.
He's not the sort of person to trust. He's a bad ________.
Unfortunately ________ built up during the race, and shortly most of the summertime boats turned to and went home.
Liz is two years ________ than Jane.
________ he leaves or I leave.
If the prisoners attempt to escape from prison ________.
No educational system is perfect. Each one has its ________.
He's not very sensible as far as money ________ are concerned .
He is the world champion. We all know ________ he is at boxing.
Our plane will arrive ________ Don Muang at noon.
